Name: Crushed Strawberry Fizz
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Top up with Soda from siphon
Instructions: MUDDLE strawberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients apart from soda, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass (without ice). TOP with soda.
Review: Fruity and all too easy to drink. Don't hold back, the lack of ice in this tall drink requires you consume while still cold. But responsibly, of course.
History: This Gin Fizz adaptation was created circa 1880 at the St. Nicholas Hotel, New York City.
